synopsis.text: Ever since he was a child, Kazuhiro Kitase has found his greatest joy in slumber, where he embarks on thrilling escapades in a dream world. As he matures, he befriends an enchanting Elf girl, their bond sealed by the mark of a Dragon. One day, Kazuhiro awakens to find a familiar face beside him - the Elf girl from his dreams! As reality and fantasy blur, Kazuhiro sets off on a new journey through Japan, accompanied by his mystical companion. Join Kazuhiro and the captivating Elf girl as they navigate the wonders and challenges of the real world!
synopsis.author: mistral.mistral-large-2402-v1:0
